body_html: Probably better to keep image rotation and transformation in this ticket. There are already tf.image.resize_* methods that will probably stay unchanged. We might want to keep the existing ops for all of those, but we can also have a helper to create a transform for resizing.
body_text: Probably better to keep image rotation and transformation in this ticket. There are already tf.image.resize_* methods that will probably stay unchanged. We might want to keep the existing ops for all of those, but we can also have a helper to create a transform for resizing.
body: Probably better to keep image rotation and transformation in this ticket. There are already tf.image.resize_* methods that will probably stay unchanged. We might want to keep the existing ops for all of those, but we can also have a helper to create a transform for resizing.
